Schalter has 26 years of experience in the market of commercial and industrial automation and information technology. A specialist in providing self-service terminals, compact computers and service management systems. Headquarters in Porto Alegre - RS, Brazil and operating all over the country.
In Addition to its two units in Porto Alegre (RS), one in the East Zone and the other in the North Zone, the company has service in the capital of São Paulo and Rio de Janeiro.
